section.title: changedzone Datatype - Atomia DNS API
section.para: [changedzone|changedzone Datatype - Atomia DNS API] is a struct with the following members: || Member || Type || Description || | id | int | the id of the change-row | | name | string | the name of the zone this change-row applies to | | changetime | int | he unix timestamp of this change (will be used as serial in SOA) |
